mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `admin_role` ( `name`, `site_id`, `targets`, `is_superuser`, created_by, create_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{site.id}, #{targets}, #{isSuperuser}, #{createdBy.id}, now(), #{lastUpdatedBy.id}, now() )
mapper.select: select r.`id`, r.`name`, r.`site_id` as "site.id", r.`targets`, r.`is_superuser`, r.created_by as "createdBy.id", r.create_date, r.last_updated_by as "lastUpdatedBy", r.last_update_date, s.name as "site.name", uc.username as "createdBy.username", uc.first_name as "createdBy.firstName", uc.last_name as "createdBy.lastName", ul.username as "lastUpdatedBy.username", ul.first_name as "lastUpdatedBy.firstName", ul.last_name as "lastUpdatedBy.lastName" from `admin_role` r left join site s on s.id = r.site_id left join ila_user uc on uc.id = r.created_by left join ila_user ul on ul.id = r.last_updated_by where r.id = #{id}

select r.`id`, r.`name`, r.`site_id` as "site.id", r.`targets`, r.`is_superuser`, r.created_by as "createdBy.id", r.create_date, r.last_updated_by as "lastUpdatedBy", r.last_update_date, s.name as "site.name", uc.username as "createdBy.username", uc.first_name as "createdBy.firstName", uc.last_name as "createdBy.lastName", ul.username as "lastUpdatedBy.username", ul.first_name as "lastUpdatedBy.firstName", ul.last_name as "lastUpdatedBy.lastName" from `admin_role` r left join site s on s.id = r.site_id left join ila_user uc on uc.id = r.created_by left join ila_user ul on ul.id = r.last_updated_by
1=1
